sections.paragraph: + A Levite of the family of Merari, and ancestor of Ethan the singer (1 Chronicles 6:44) + One of the sons of Bani. (Ezra 10:29) and + One of the descendants of Harim, (Ezra 10:32) who had married foreign wives. + A priest or family of priests. (Nehemiah 10:4) and + One of the heads of the people who signed the covenant with Nehemiah. (Nehemiah 10:27) + One of the families of priests who returned with Zerubbabel, (Nehemiah 12:2) probably the same as No. 4.
